name: A-Tech Cybernetic VR
description: Built exclusively for VR, A-Tech Cybernetic's Story Mode will offer hours of explosive fun, while Swarm Mode will test your grit in a sci-fi nightmare scenario. Stop the mutant invasion at a futuristic megacorp, controlling an arsenal of weapons with real life movements!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Requirements are for Early Access
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Requirements are for Early Access
